Reviews.Title: “Amazing Staff & Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Hadwa
Reviews.Content: We have really enjoyed our stay in this hotel, one of the finest hotels I've ever been to. The staff was super friendly.. Meral (the receptionist), Sadik and HÃ¼seyÄ±n, they were extremely helpful & great staff :) Couldn't ask for more! The room was very clean and we loved the city's view from the room, could see Istanbul from the top :) The breakfast was very nice as well. It's very close to Taksim, the Metro & Istiklal Street, we could easily find what we need in the area. I totally recommend this hotel to my friends and everyone who really wants to enjoy their stay in Istanbul :)

Reviews.Title: “poor insulation, mold in bathroom”
Reviews.Author: gonca-melih
Reviews.Content: it was an average hotel. I noted 3 things about this hotel; first, the insulation was poor; the hotel is next to a street which is used actively and all the voices are in the room. Second, mold in the bathroom and third, heater didn't work properly. Food and other things were standard, nothing special.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoy our stay in SV Boutique Hotel! :)”
Reviews.Author: Lena2211
Reviews.Content: It is small, cute hotel close to Taksim square! Very good location! Our stay was very pleasant! Rooms very clean.. brf was very nice.. service good! We didn`t expect much.. but we really but really enjoy our stay in this hotel! Around hotel u`ll find many nice cafes, small shops but it is not noisy.. u`ll sleep well:) We definitely recomend this hotel!!!

Reviews.Title: “very nice rooms, very friendly staff, nice breakfast”
Reviews.Author: gvergis
Reviews.Content: the staff was very helpful, friendly & kind!! ozkan has been one of the most kind and smiley guy in the staff!! our stay was very pleasant, we are surely recommend it!! thank you all!! :D

Reviews.Title: “Location good but not the hotel”
Reviews.Author: mactt
Reviews.Content: location is good with good price but came to know later that there are plenty of hotels in the same area - The hotel staff was not at all courteous and services was bad !

Reviews.Title: “great value for money”
Reviews.Author: grevageo
Reviews.Content: it is a great hotel centraly located in a pedestrian road just 50m from Taksim square. Rooms: verey clean, average decoration but just fine for the cost, fast internet free everywhere. Breakfast decent, nothing special but all the nesessary things. Location: great. you can walk around and get the real feeling of the city. Traditional and trendy restaurants, bars, cafe, shops are in walking distance. And also very close by taxi to all the sightseeing. Staff was very friendly and helpful. All speak english. I would highly recomend it as a value for money solution.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location, nice rooms and reasonable price!”
Reviews.Author: AnnaScorpio
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located very close to Taxim area with lots of pub, bars, restaurants and night clubs. Most of them are wlaking distance from SV Boutique hotel. At the same time, it's quite in the room. Free good speed wi-fi interent was big advantage ;))) We were lucky to get suit room with very good prices (booked online). The room was modern decorated, flat screen tv, good bathroom and the balcony! The only problem was communication with the stuff due to their poor english. All the rest was great! I reccomend this hotel to spend a nice weekend in Istanbul !

Reviews.Title: “Great, Strongly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: Zamzami
Reviews.Content: Great Location, V.Clean Room, very polite and kind staff and helpful, V.Good Price, Free Internet, Excellent Breakfast, I strongly recommend it specially for family and Group Friends.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible attitude”
Reviews.Author: MorrisMundo
Reviews.Content: This hotel is actually very nice. But with one exception. One of the guys at the reception was really horrible. I had actually been upgraded to a suite, but I was not allowed to bring a friend into it without paying for double occupancy. He was really rude and made my friend feel really ackward. A shame, really. Cause the hotel itself is pretty good, but the management should sort out some of their employees. .

Reviews.Title: “cozy, with great service”
Reviews.Author: yduno
Reviews.Content: I was in Istanbul for a conference at Istanbul Technical University and chose this place from the list of conference hotels. Great choice (several of my conference colleagues fled one of the nearby hotels to move here). The hotel is in a semi-pedestrianised hotel district (with about ten or so hotels of similar size). Plenty of restaurants and small shops catering to tourists. Taksim Square (with good transport links, including to the airport) is about a 3 minute walk. Even though I booked a single room, they put me in an eighth floor suite with two TVs, two telephones, jacuzzi tub, bidet, minibar, room safe, terrycloth robes & slippers (note that some of these amenities are available in all rooms). In-room wifi is free and worked fine. A good mix of channels on the TV for visitors, including two BBC channels. Very clean, with tasteful modern decor. Slight nitpick: the room lighting is acceptable, but could be slightly improved to give a warmer feel in the living room. The staff were incredibly courteous. Very good breakfasts, with very attentive staff . The reception staff didn't charge me for the computer printouts I needed (although might have had I needed to print more). Since this is a boutique hotel with minimal extra facilities (like most in this district) I can't say whether this is value for money, as I paid a conference rate (â‚¬115) and was upgraded. But if the cost is acceptable this is an excellent place. Note that most of the full service large international luxury hotels (Hilton, etc.) are also nearby, if that's what you prefer.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: Joethting
Reviews.Content: No reviews were available earlier. However the photos looked great. Decided to take a chance. THe price was within my budget. The hotel turned out as expected. Everything about it was great. THe location was superb. Approx. 5-10 min walk from Taksim square where it's bustling. Plenty of nice reasonably priced local kebab shops nearby. The rooms were new and contemporarily designed. The staff were very courteous. THe hotel looks very new. Free internet servie in lobby and free wifi in rooms. They had a few eng channels on TV so no probs. It's facing the pedestrian area but it's not noisy as the soundproofing was good. Loved the hotel. If there is any downside, then the room is a little bit small but more than spacious enuff.

HotelInfo.Name: SV Boutique Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Topcu Caddesi No. 21, Istanbul 34437, Turkey
